Posts.Content: Mar 21, 2010 04:08AM linginkim wrote: I know those feelings that you are having. Of course you are overwhelmed. You may start to feel better after you get the cancer out of you. Breast cancer treatment comes in stages. Surgery, chemo, possibly radiation, diet, nutrition, medications. Take it one step at a time. You are going to come through this journey. Speak to people about your fears. Here is a great place to do that. Sometimes the fears become smaller the more you talk about them. You are in for a tough few months, then the sun comes out again. Soon you start to feel like a survivor. Then you will even have days when you forget that you had cancer. For now, take it one step at a time and do the best you can. Be super kind to yourself. Talk to your family and friends.Â
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed & Overwhelmed VRamos Denise2287
